game.name: Myth Requiem
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Myth Requiem is a mythology RPG with idle and auto-battle mechanics. Lead legendary heroes like Ulysses and Sun Wukong, explore ancient realms, and build a living bestiary by capturing, battling, and cataloging hundreds of legendary creatures in a story-driven quest for divine power.
